section.title: Description
section.p: The type of material used in this treatment.

stentry.p: Identifies the type of material used in this treatment. Possible values are matUnknown; matAmalgam; matGold; matMetallic; matPorcelain; matResin; matSedative; matPFM; matGuttaPercha; matPaste; matSilverPoint; matNone etc. DRM Plus Program Specific.
